website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy and larger in size than most; will crack a back like the best of them.
pros: Used by both men and women, and is reported to be an effective alternative to more rigid, yoga blocks
Noted for its overall value and ability to relieve pressure for people of all sizes and physical ability

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel and customer service
customer_reviews.text: The wheel came fast and packaged nicely! Right away when the order was shipped I received an email with my e-book and then another email with a link to the book when the order was delivered to ensure that I received the product. The Wheel is extremely sturdy and the foam on the outside is a perfect blend that sticks to the floor so it doesn't roll away and softness so it doesn't hurt my back. I ordered this because I am constantly using a friends, she also loves it. I also love that it came with a yoga strap, which I was in the market for an this took the thinking out of that process!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a yoga wheel to increase my back flexibility and help with back pain. I’ve had this for a bit and I use it a few times a day. My back pain has greatly improved I have a long way to go to increase my flexibility and really reduce my back pain but this is a great start. The wheel is very sturdy and I have no doubt that it will support my weight. This was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. Newman

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is top notch!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Talk about customer service! I got personal email asking how I liked the yoga wheel. I responded, sharing my primary uses for it and that I was new to a yoga wheel and was recovering from an accident. They replied back concerned for my health and offering more ebooks and tips to aid in my recovery! Oh, and the yoga wheel is super durable! I’m tall and felt very secure laying on the wheel and moving around. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: High value yoga wheel
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wheel with extra value for customer. Came on time with a strap and ebook of suggested poses. I’m a senior who does a lot of yoga but I’ve never used a wheel before. After reading a lot of reviews I decided on this company and this wheel. Great customer service, help with poses on the wheel and all questions answered. My flexibility and back strength seems to be improving with daily practice on the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: ladyg

customer_reviews.title: Great product and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new yoga wheel from Pete’s Choice. Not only is it highly functional it is so pretty to look at. Excellent pricing with the e-book and strap. Pete is very friendly and has excellent customer service! I would not hesitate shopping with Pete’s Choice. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: K Dickens

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've EVER made
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my favorite purchase I have EVER made!! Helps with my yoga a lot. But my favorite thing about this, it helps my back!! I work long shifts sometimes 10 up to 12 hours. After work my back just hurts. Even when I'm not doing yoga I stretch and message my back on this baby. It relieves so much pressure and pain. This has become my baby. I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yoga wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing yoga wheel! I've been looking for something like this for a very long time, and it comes with a band as well which makes this purchase a steal! This deal also includes an eBook so you can get started on poses that will help with flexibility and overall mobility. I would suggest this yoga wheel to anyone looking to improve poses.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at a price cheaper than the competition
customer_reviews.text: First off: I'm about 250 pounds and this holds up to my back bends without a problem. It is very sturdy and appears to be very high-quality material all around. Excellent value compared to the Plexus which is $20 more. I am able to crack my upper back using this for back bends. There are plenty of videos on the internet about other ways to use this but so far I have only used it for back bends and it certainly helps loosen up my back. Looking forward to exploring other ways to utilize this.
customer_reviews.author: SilverFox5

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using my yoga wheel for a year. It's sturdy, durable and doesn't slip when used on a yoga mat. I haven't tried it on the bare floor, only because I haven't had reason to do so. I may not use it every day, but it is a great prop to use when I want to explore different heart-opening poses.
customer_reviews.author: D. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for any level yogi
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing yoga for 4 years and I wanted to improve. I've seen videos of yoga wheels and decided to buy one. After reading many reviews I've decided on this one. It came with a strap and pictures of poses you can do which many on amazon did not have. It's emailed to you. I also read the customer service is excellent and it has a lifetime warranty. Sold! Highly recommend this to anyone who wants to become better and more flexible doing yoga.
customer_reviews.author: VegasPA

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - it broke
customer_reviews.text: It broke the third time I used it. I don’t exceed the weight limit. I’m very disappointed and now my back hurts because I snapped under me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD FOR BACK AND SHOULDERS
customer_reviews.text: This wheel has been amazing in helping to relieve pain in my back and shoulders from the 8 hours a day I spend hunched over a computer at work. It feels safe to use and the e-book was very helpful in figuring it out!"
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Had this yoga wheel for 18 months and it just cracked and nearly injured me. Thankfully I caught myself. I used it every day so I can recommend using it when it's not cracked but this is the second one that's broken on me. The first one I got was a malfunctioned wheel but this one just collapsed under the weight after a certain time. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great yoga wheel. Haven’t had a chance to use it a lot yet, but seems sturdy and well made. Great price too. I’m sure I’ll be standing on my head in no time. Probably not, but a girl can dream. Great customer service from Pete’s Choice, was very responsive to my questions.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McT

customer_reviews.title: Great for my back!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing an ad for the Plexus wheel. I couldn't be happier. My has been giving me problems for years, and I had generally given up on relief. This gives me a bit more confidence that I can get my back into shape with the relief I feel after several uses.
customer_reviews.author: A. LeBon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!  (And I thought that the yoga wheel was something like a human hamster wheel!!)
customer_reviews.text: My wife told me she wanted a yoga wheel and I thought that we had gotten a hamster named Yoga or Yoda. When she clarified my ignorance I went about searching for her request and presented various options. Based on the rating and price she selected this wheel and she could not be happier with the quality and use.
customer_reviews.author: JRR

customer_reviews.title: a great tool to gain confidence in yoga practice
customer_reviews.text: just went to my first class with it - is only once per month, but i feel the difference already in my body. it really does work you out, everywhere! a new way to continue loving yoga. thank you! and the ebook is a great touch to give folks. much needed and appreciated as well. the wheel is sturdy and colorful and, again, is. great workout and also a way to gain confidence in your yoga practice - to advance it.
customer_reviews.author: t2

customer_reviews.title: Gives a nice stretch
customer_reviews.text: One of my troupe members let me try her yoga wheel to stretch out my back, so I had to get my own. My back feels really good once I stretch it out with the yoga wheel. It opens up my chest for deeper breathing.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: I like to use this yoga wheel to open up my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this yoga wheel to open up my thoracic spine area (upper back). I like most people need to improve my posture. A lot of us are constantly in an inward slouched position with shoulders and head forward. (driving, working at a computer, looking down at a phone, etc.) This wheel along with some corrective exercise (yoga, kb swings, standing more, and just being aware of posture throughout the day) has helped to straighten things out and make me more aligned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wheel is super sturdy and has held up for a couple months ...
customer_reviews.text: The wheel is super sturdy and has held up for a couple months now with no nicks in the rubber surface. The belt that comes with it is also high quality and LONG! They also send you a couple e-books for how to use it. The customer service was great when I needed help. Would enthusiastically recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Finally - a great back stretch!
customer_reviews.text: I have spent years looking for some way of stretching my middle and upper back. I've used foam rollers, back stretchers that support the spine's curvature, hanging upside down...but this is what I've needed all along. It's sturdy, it's comfortable, and it provides me with a significant amount of pain relief. As a bonus, the seller was great about reaching out to make sure I had received the eBook and that I was happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen G.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very stable
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my wheel 2 days ago and my bf and I have been using it since it came in. It's great quality, it's heavier than you would think which gives it more stability and makes you feel more secure while you're leaning all your weight on it. We have been using it to pop our backs. I am 9 months pregnant and it took me about 2 minutes rolling back and forth on the wheel to crack my back everywhere it was hurting. I would highly recomend this product. Also, so live the color. My bf wanted a different color but.... that's his problem. :P
customer_reviews.author: Rose walden

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED: Great—while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I’m a big guy (a little over 300) and this helps me get fully inverted into candlestick. I also used it for reverse planks on my back to strengthen core, etc. UPDATE: a new Wheel arrived at my house today. Didn’t order, but great that Pete’s choice stands behind their products! Past tense is intentional. It broke on me after a little less than 7 months. I’m sad now. Update 2: second lasted about 7 more months. Still love it and used it every day. Not sure if I’ll reorder or go with a different one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Namaste
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get suckered into buying the 50 dollar plus versions of this! This yoga wheel is fantastic quality and very sturdy. The cushion is just enough. Packaging was nice and the bonus strap is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Geron

customer_reviews.title: great product, great company to buy from
customer_reviews.text: The product is great and exactly what is advertised. The free strap that comes with it is also of high quality. And Pete's Choice takes excellent care of customers. You can tell Pete is serious about customer service and goes above and beyond the norm. I recommend the yoga wheel (which is an excellent prop at every level of practice) and would happily buy other products that this seller adds to the product line.
customer_reviews.author: nyc customer

customer_reviews.title: Snap, Crackle, Pop...and in a GOOD way!
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what I needed it to do - plus it's well made and I have no fear of it snapping or flying out from underneath me when in some precarious position! I purchased this to help stretch out my back and open up my hips (sorry, sounded bad...but it's the truth) and it works beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to purchase because of the mixed reviews but I'm really glad I did! I've been suffering from a lot of back and neck pain the last couple years and this wheel was my savior. It feels sturdy and it's really easy to use for someone who does pretty basic yoga poses. I love the strap too!
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service! Stands behind their products!
customer_reviews.text: My yoga wheel has been one of the best investments I have made in a long, long time. I use it daily, sometimes twice a day. My back flexibility has increased and my usual pain and stiffness is gone. I had a cosmetic problem with my first wheel and I contacted the company and they replaced it free of charge! They even sent me some free yoga blocks and a strap! The company really stands behind their products. I was initially nervous about purchasing a wheel since I am plus size but it is sturdy and I feel completely comfortable and supported! I would (and already have) recommended this product to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga tool to help you workout your core and your yoga poses!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to challenged yourself while working out and doing yoga at home. I couldn't wait to try it! It really helps you if you are working towards your dolphin post or building your core. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: mayan5

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. It really helps me roll out my back. It gets into the places it needs to and really works out the toughness between my spine and shoulder blade, which is where I have most of my problems. The first one I bought had some small white crack lines on it. I contacted the seller and they were very prompt at responding to me and sending me a new one. The new one has zero problems. The customer service is phenomenal and I would definitely recommend buying this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. and Mrs. Green

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the wheel for my back, but was astounded on what it did for my sciatica...I use it three times a day and I can walk with zero pain!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W.

customer_reviews.title: Great for any experienced yogi or anyone needing a good stretch!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wheel and the blocks are sturdy and the perfect size! I received this wheel as a gift, which was apparently the smallest size. I am of a smaller build and practice yoga, so this worked perfectly, but would suggest a larger size for anyone that is taller, just starting out or needing a wider base. Its perfect to use in yoga sessions or just a quick stretch!
customer_reviews.author: KaiGen0Ne

customer_reviews.title: I liked that the seller sent me 2 ebooks for it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my yoga instructor roommate for Christmas. She loves it! I liked that the seller sent me 2 ebooks for it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Crum

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable item. When it arrived I thought it was going to be a poorly constructed wheel but after opening the package and handling it I can honestly say that it is very well made. Not like other wheels I’ve purchased in the past. This wheel is very sturdy and very rigid. I will purchase more items from Pete’s Choice in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great way to loosen up your back
customer_reviews.text: I tried it out as soon as it was delivered and immediately got four pops out of my mid back. Seems well made and is easy to balance on, especially if you're used to doing a little yoga. It didn't slip or slide on my yoga mat at all. I wasn't comfortable enough to use it for very long, but my back immediately felt better.
customer_reviews.author: teacup

customer_reviews.title: Got wheel and strap Nothing in box 📦For links to ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome 👏🏾 product! I have degenerative disc disease and my physical therapist recommend this particular wheel! I thought my stretching ability was limited ( my only source of relief) until I used the wheel I realized my expectation of slow progress were limited by my perceived capability limitations-the wheel and strap lead me to a much deeper stretch than I thought possible. The pain relief is stellar!! Gonna sleep well tonight and every night from now on!! thanks Dharma Wheel you are amazing!😉
customer_reviews.author: SunGoddess

customer_reviews.title: ... easing the body in to backbends - t's particularly great if you don't feel comfortable with doing the traditional ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple and safe way of easing the body in to backbends - t's particularly great if you don't feel comfortable with doing the traditional backbends. As well, the wheel gives me the confidence to stretch further than normal, eventually allowing me to move the body in ways I never could before. It's also brilliant for easing back pain and works wonders to massage the length of the spine , no professional masseuse needed anymore! Everyone should have a yoga wheel in their lives! love it!
customer_reviews.author: MartaBB

customer_reviews.title: This wheel is great for stretching and releasing tension and muscular tightness in ...
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is great for stretching and releasing tension and muscular tightness in my back, chest, shoulders, abdomen ​ and hip flexors. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kish Mir  in Tuchus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality product. Some of my clients are close to 300lbs, they roll over it and not a crack!
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Gachot

customer_reviews.title: This wheel is amazing! My back has been sore and tight around ...
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is amazing! My back has been sore and tight around the right lower hip area for about a week now. I used this right after it was delivered and feels like my spine is realigned. The soreness and dull ach is gone. Love the wheel!!!! Thanks for such a wonderful, high quality, strong and nice looking product!
customer_reviews.author: Mini Hachi

customer_reviews.title: An interesting little device for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I got this wheel not for yoga, but to roll out and open my back for pain relief. I do regularly see a physical therapist and get adjusted weekly. However, sometimes you wake up and your back just hurts. That's when this wheel comes in handy! It's nice to roll out your back, you do hear your spine crack from the adjustment. This takes a little time to get used to, but once you get the knack for it, it's a trusty little device. Again, I haven't tried it for yoga, but that is my next step!
customer_reviews.author: Cella

customer_reviews.title: It cracked under my weight (205 lbs)- Scarey
customer_reviews.text: I loved the roller, I have had it for months. Great concept, rolling my back made a big difference in just a few days. However, it just broke. Thank god it just cracked and didn't shatter, as I don't want sharp bits of plastic jamming into my spine with all of my weight on it. There could have been an injury for sure. I will be buying a different brand. Be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Aploon

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my wife because her back hurts all the time, and I love her a lot, so I usually give her back massages. But she laid on this for a week and the first time she went to use it, her back cracked incredibly well before she even got into full position! She said she has been looking for something her whole life to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: i Own a small personal training studio and use this roller with a lot of my clients to loosen up their thoracic spine area. I haven’t had it for very long but it seems sturdy. I look forward to playing around with I to see how else I can be using.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne L. Ho

customer_reviews.title: Not just a yoga wheel...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. Not only does it help to stretch my back but my 6 year old daughter also likes to play with it and my cats like to lay in it. So it has multiple uses! :-) Very sturdy material. Oh and the strap works very well, however, you need to position the D clamp a certain way so that it does not pinch your skin (you will catch on quickly to what I mean when you try it out). Other than that... I am very satisfied with the purchase. Just having it a week I have noticed my back becoming more flexible!
customer_reviews.author: TigersKrt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wheel. I mostly bought this wheel to help me get into inversion yoga poses but it ended up being just as helpful for stretching my back out. Even if you dont do yoga but suffer from back pain this wheel is a great benefit. I would definitely recommend having one.
customer_reviews.author: KLC22

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this ring
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ring. I use it 3 times a day and my back has become so much more flexible. I can now do 'the wheel' which a yoga move that I never thought I would do.
customer_reviews.author: michelle Pleadwell

customer_reviews.title: Good product but be careful!!
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings with this.. the product is made very well so no concerns there and it does what it is supposed to do, however be careful!!! you can really hurt yourself with this if you don’t use it properly. I really hurt my neck with this and found it to be quite painful on the shoulder area; however, i do like it for the lower back it gets the cracks and kinks out which feels good.. just be aware that you should be in somewhat decent shape to use this and that it really benefits those who are very flexible and into yoga which I’m not so if you fit into that category this would be 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Carolan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product - A+++
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, just what I needed to stretch my back. It's extremely sturdy, and easy to maneuver. I use it before exercise, and before I go to sleep. Product arrive on time, and packaged sufficiently. All in all A+++, will recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mac1

customer_reviews.title: but I made an excellent choice. I have scoliosis and this has help ...
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant when reading other reviews, but I made an excellent choice. I have scoliosis and this has help me with back pain. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: OJAR

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: My friend told me such good things about this yoga wheel, I decided to have a look what else this seller had. I ended up also buying their balance pad and I’m glad I did. The prices are lower than some of the other sellers AND you get bonus free stuff as well. I’ll have to say I really like both products. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: lunaceee

customer_reviews.title: Great product & customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this for me as an early Christmas gift. I absolutely love it! It is durable (& pretty!). Not only is it a great product, but I am impressed with the business as well. They emailed me personally to follow up and make sure I was happy with the yoga wheel. Another perk? They provided an ebook including different ways to use the item and make sure I get the most out of it! I would definitely recommend purchasing this yoga wheel from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, very well made and most reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, very well made and most reasonably priced. I appreciated the bonus yoga strap as well. This is so helpful with any type of back bend in yoga. Great seller, too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool for yoga postures
customer_reviews.text: I like that this rolls, as opposed to more static props, and that I am only limited by imagination when it comes to using this. Well constructed, comfortable, and a good investment. I love that a strap was included, and I tucked it into my yoga bag immediately. Really appreciated the company reaching out to make sure I was happy and the ebooks I received.
customer_reviews.author: redmagiq

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Broke after less than 2 years with only moderate use. contacted the company thru their website and haven't received a reply. What's worse is I hurt my back even more upon it breaking during use, and I'm only 5'9" 270 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: cameronjd

customer_reviews.title: buy one now!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this a few days, and after using it 2-3 times a day, my chronic shoulder pain I've had for 17 years is nearly GONE. I've been going to massage therapy every month for years... this is way cheaper and faster! Can't believe this actually works, and not hard to use or painful for me at all!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Herniated disk relief
customer_reviews.text: My coworker advised me to try this wheel for my back pain. I currently have L5-S1 disk herniation. Therapy is pricey so wanted to help myself. I use this wheel daily and found many youtube stretching videos and i must say my pain goes away instantly after doing stretches with this wheel. It has helped me gain some flexibility already in a month. I will utilize this with my therapy sessions.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: The height and padding are perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Far and away the most affordable yoga wheel, without any cut corners. The height and padding are perfect for me: enough to push my edge, but comfortably and safely. I've always been shy of approaching the bigger backbends (pincha mayurasana or forearm stand, among others) in my home practice, but this wheel has leant me bravery and progress. The inclusion of the yoga strap is also a generous touch on behalf of Pete's Choice, so namaste to all involved.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Definitely wouldnt hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! The strap and ebooks were nice perks for ideas as well but the product in and of itself is very sturdy and has helped tremendously with back flexibility and to crack it when it gets bound up. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: JEA2018

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain and tension relief!
customer_reviews.text: Not the sturdiest wheel I've used but it's great for the price! Especially with 2 blocks and a strap included. Great for yoga beginners and folks who need a proper back crack more often than most. If you sit all day do yourself a favor and pick up one of these! It saves me from having to visit the chiropractor as often since it allows me to relieve tension using my own body weight. Very useful!
customer_reviews.author: Moon

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete package received
customer_reviews.text: I had to order the item twice because the first time the promised belt was not included. As this was a white elephant gift requested specifically by the recipient, I didn't want to give her less than what was advertised. Also, I think it would be better to send a printed book rather than an ebook, because if the item is a gift, the buyer has to then find a way to get the ebook electronically to the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: culinary crazed

customer_reviews.title: just great !
customer_reviews.text: everything like i was expecting ...really enjoying my wheel and all the tips i get from the ebooks the company is sending me....great customer service !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lia Trovati

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE and Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It's my first yoga wheel and have had it over a week and it's worked great! It does an excellent job rolling out my back as well. Originally the product was shipped without the free extra strap and when I messaged them they shipped out not one but TWO yoga straps for me to keep one and give another to a loved one. I am beyond pleased with the customer service and the item does exactly what I need it to. Thank you so much Pete's Choice!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Mullen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a yogi by any means, but a friend recommended this to help stretch my back which I have issues with. This thing is awesome! I even tried some of the moves from the ebook that was sent to me from the seller. Super great product.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Plastic broke at seam
customer_reviews.text: Well. It was good for stretching and cracking my back until one morning it snapped at the seam. 500lb weight limit? Not sure what happened there. Happened while stretching and left a large scratch bruise on my back. Had a year. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching, durable.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I don't even use this for yoga. When I'm in a pinch, I just lay on this wheel to stretch my back out. Very durable. I am ~145lb, my husband who's ~185lb has used this as well and the wheel kept its shape. He sees a chiro for back issues and uses the wheel as well in between his appointments as an adjunct to his in-home exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful tool for relaxing as well as strengthening. I lie back on it at the end of the day. It's comfortable and can ease muscle tension. I like the fact that it's so stable. You can exercise with it also. I highly recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Global Business Management

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, good design, fast service, nice tool
customer_reviews.text: I used it the first night I got it and actually got an audible adjustment to my lower back which I wasn't expecting. I went to my chiropractor the next day to see if everything was as it should be as I was a bit sore and he was impressed that my legs were perfectly even, indicating it was "a good crack", not a bad one. The gripping texture on the wheel makes the stretching positions feel secure--just be cautious as you learn how it works, use a gentle gradient noting how your body responds (it shouldn't hurt more than a controlled, conservative stretch), and make sure you center it properly before you lean onto it.
customer_reviews.author: Pragmatic Gal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE my new yoga wheel
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my new yoga wheel! Been shopping for one for months now & this was the best quality for the lowest price! I am so happy to finally have my yoga wheel! And free strap! Thank u!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is my first yoga wheel, so I don't have anything to compare it to, but I LOVE it. It has really enhanced my yoga practice and it is sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Back pain easer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this wheel. I bought it to help with lower back pain that I’ve had for quite some time and the relief was almost immediate. I even had my dad try it (who was hesitant at first). He’s not a small guy and his back cracked immediately. Just make sure you’re on even ground bc he slow motion fell (he wasn’t hurt 🤣). He also suffers from mild scoliosis and now he’s asking for one too! the price is great and the product is even better. The yoga strap is a great add and I was able to find a bunch of stretches for both on YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzlyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome yoga wheel. Solid construction and enough padding to be comfortable but still firm. I’m using it to increase my back flexibility and to relieve tension. I spend a lot of time at a computer, it’s awesome to take a 5 minute break and stretch out my back a few times a day. This company also has EXCELLENT customer service with quick responses. Highly recommend this yoga wheel!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: The cats also think it's pretty cool.
customer_reviews.text: I can't compare this to other wheels as I can't say I've tried any others, but: this has a good weight to it, it appears to function as intended, and my spine flexibility has improved.
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: Promotes instability and support during any backbend activities.
customer_reviews.text: I use the product for Yoga sessions. However my main goal purchasing the product is to promote endurance strength and instability for area of the back. Also I find very relaxing for training posture. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Maristela G Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Deepen Your Yoga Practice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality yoga wheel. I also received an email from Pete's Choice with a user manual to get me started!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L Murry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So glad my hubby gave me this as a gift. Love the stretch! He gave me anofher size from a different brand and this one is much better quality. Couldn't be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love my yoga wheel! It can be used for the beginner and expert users but I must warn that you can cause serious damage to yourself if used inappropriately or incorrectly. The wheel has helped tremendously with my occasional back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Eze

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This wheel is so sturdy. I have never used one before so I wasn't sure what to expect. It took me a little while to get used to, but I love it! My back feels great and I love that I'm able to deepen my stretches with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Slawson

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this for very long so I will update if something changes from my initial review. Feels good and helps loosen up your back. Seems pretty sturdy also I'm not a small person 6ft 265lbs and holds up good and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: JP2

customer_reviews.title: Not happy as this was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Received product on time. Did not receive a strap with the wheel and there are gashes in the material around the ring. There was no information with the wheel about directions or where to find info pertaining to an ebook. Not happy as this was a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Auerbach

customer_reviews.title: Helps me with my back. strengting and with back ...
customer_reviews.text: Helps me with my back.strengting and with back issues it's been a big help for me. Also my husband uses for his shoulders as well. Everyone in family is enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: I love the stretch it gives
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I love the stretch it gives. Helps me with the opening of my chest stretch. I can't wait to continue to play with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dharma Wheel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. Carefully correct posture and core strength I’ve time.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Keyes

customer_reviews.title: I have found that it is of great quality and look forward to the benefits it will ...
customer_reviews.text: New to the yoga wheel, I have found that it is of great quality and look forward to the benefits it will bring to relief from arthritis in my back and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Snow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I use it regularly but i recently started using it while on my period for my lower back pain and its a freaking god send. Hand to God it works so well, better than paying 60/hr for a massage.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam Gomez

customer_reviews.title: creaks a bit
customer_reviews.text: makes a creaking sound sometimes which scares me but i really like it to open my upper back after hunching over a laptop most of the day
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No instruction, no pamphlet, no paperwork.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself- perfect. Worth every penny. The issue- that box has nothing but the product. No instruction sheet, no product distinguishing papers, nothing... so I had a lot of explaining to do when it was unwrapped. Whatever- it does what it says it will (once I explained it). I’m happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: VaNessa

customer_reviews.title: not very useful
customer_reviews.text: My main complaint about this prop is that it has bad traction with the yoga mat, causing it to slip out of place. Also, it tips over very easily, so it's hard to work with period! Not a very good prop to add to your yoga equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK! this thing is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: YES!!! I feel like more people need to know about this wheel! The way it just cracks my back after a long work day it's just amazing, I do many stretches with this and I feel like I was born again after every use. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Andrijana

customer_reviews.title: Feels Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It had bought the wheel for my sister, as she always has back issues. To say the least, it gets used Every Day! My sister loves it, and honestly, so do I! I plan to get another for myself in the future! The company also provides excellent customer service if you have any questions.
customer_reviews.author: Curious Creative Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for so many poses!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! I am 49 and my back is not as flexible as it used to be. This wheel is great for stretching as well as support for other yoga poses. It came with a strap and cards that show me different poses I can use it with! Great purchase and I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer San Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of problems with my back and started using the yoga wheel for the purposes of stretching and pain relief. I have found that it has wonders to relieve tightness in my back. I look forward to also developing my core strength. Delivery was very prompt as I received the item much sooner than anticipated. So far delighted with product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lower back pain released
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this would work like similar products but have to say, this really helps with lower back pain. I sit sometimes during the day at a desk and by using this 2x a day, I really do see a difference. The first 2 times I used it I was a bit sore but that went away and now I use it regularly and find great results. The only thing I would say is stretching my lower back is the only use for it and personally, I don't think the other uses for it are too impactful. For the lower back, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office
customer_reviews.text: Good back stretching/popping wheel! It helps after a long day at the desk. If I have back pain after a day at the computer, this wheel really helps!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Capes

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to the crip wheel
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for a yoga roller, great to relief back pain. The only recommend would be to have foam thicker and and grove in center for spine. The crip wheel comes that way already with the new upgarde.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Only used once, so I don't have extensive feedback yet as I still need to learn some poses to do with it, but I'm excited to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Woods

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first yoga wheel but has been extremely easy to use. The added padding around the wheel give it more cushion when used for stretching.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but it was a bit too big for ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it but it was a bit too big for me. I want to try the smaller one. Also, seller is AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynth

customer_reviews.title: E-book wasn't not included in my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was sad that the e-book was not included in my purchase. It's not very comfortable but that might be the size is just too large for me, otherwise it's sturdy and perhaps if I was used to it, it would work better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: This yoga wheel is GREAT! It is strong and made from quality materials. My husband is 6'4" and 195 lbs and has used it daily since we received it. Also, Pete's Choice provides EXCELLENT customer service! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

product_meta.title: pete's choice Dharma Yoga Wheel with Bonus eBook & Free Yoga Strap | Comfortable & Durable Yoga Balance Accessory | Increase Flexibility | Ideal Back Stretcher
feature_bullets: CHANGE YOUR LIFE: Back massage, better balance, more flexibility and core strength are among the many advantageous benefits of the wheel. Create deeper asana - the physical practice of yoga and its strengthening postures

MULTIPLE HEALTH BENEFITS: Scientific research supports the mental and physical benefits of yoga. Mentally, yoga can reduce stress and anxiety. Physically you can achieve a more flexible, shapely, and internally healthy body. Pete's Wheel is the perfect yoga companion.
SUPERIOR CONSTRUCTION: Pete's Choice Yoga Wheel is made of high-quality, durable ABS material. It's sturdy, safe, and comfortable unlike other flimsier yoga wheels on the market.
BONUS MATERIAL: Receive a free eBook (sent by email) describing 16 soothing and rejuvenating poses. Also free is a sturdy strap to promote flexibility and sustain demanding yoga poses.
100% CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: Pete's Choice comfy and ultra-durable yoga/dharma wheel is covered by a lifetime warranty.
